text: The Deep is a 1977 American British adventure movie directed by Peter Yates and based on the novel of the same name by Peter Benchley. It stars Robert Shaw, Jacqueline Bisset, Nick Nolte, Eli Wallach, Louis Gossett Jr. and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1978. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 movies Category:1977 adventure movies Category:1970s American adventure movies Category:British adventure movies Category:Movies set underwater Category:Movies directed by Peter Yates Category:Movies composed by John Barry Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: The Deep (1977 movie)
